name: Incandescent Frost Permeating
description: End Phase: If the opponent's La Signora has already switched to Crimson Witch of Embers, then Blazing Heat will be attached to your active character. If she has not yet switched, then attach Sheer Cold, and the opponent's La Signora loses 1 Energy.
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>End Phase:</color> If the opponent's $[A2102] has already switched to $[A6301], then <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C163011]</color> will be attached to your active character. If she has not yet switched, then attach <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C121022]</color>, and the opponent's $[A2102] loses 1 $[K310].
descriptionreplaced: <color=#FFFFFFFF>End Phase:</color> If the opponent's La Signora has already switched to Crimson Witch of Embers, then <color=#FFFFFFFF>Blazing Heat</color> will be attached to your active character. If she has not yet switched, then attach <color=#FFFFFFFF>Sheer Cold</color>, and the opponent's La Signora loses 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#1110}Energy</color>.
